Breakfast: Rice Noodles: South Indian RecipeÂ  Servings: 2 Duration: 10 mins One of the fastest breakfast which I had been preparing from years is Lemon Rice Noodles, there are many other simplest breakfast recipes but I like this quick and delicious rice noodles could be prepared with in 10 mins. I can say it's a lazy Or busy morning breakfast â˜ºï¸Â  in either cases you have less time to make dishes in kitchen, at this moment rice noodles is the best breakfast & I'm sure kids love to have this healthy rice noodles ğŸ˜Š (Because No sauce added) In this quick breakfast, No onion no garlic no tomato ğŸ…Â required very less ingredients easily available in every Indian's Kitchen shelves which makes your dish full of flavors and ended it with lemon juice. I hope you like it Let's start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Rice Noodles - thin size - 250 gms
  • Green chillies - 2 - finely chopped
  • Roasted Cashew nuts - 2 tb sp - chopped
  • Turmeric powder - 1/2 tsp
  • Salt - 1 1/2 tsp
  • Lemon juice - 1 tb sp
  • Cilantro - chopped - 1/4 cup
  • Water - 220 ml
For tempering:
  • Mustard seeds - 1/2 tsp
  • Cumin seeds - 1 tsp
  • Urad Dal - 1/2 tb sp
  • Chana Dal/ Bengal gram - Â 1/2 tb sp
  • Curry leaves - 6
  • Oil - 1 tb sp
Procedure:
  • Heat frying pan over medium heat
  • Add oil, tempering ingredients & let them splutter
  • Next add green chillies and cashew nuts
  • Saute & add turmeric powder and salt
  • Mix well and add water
  • Let it boil
  • Add rice noodles, mix well and cover with lid
  • Cook 5 mins on low to medium heat
  • Rice noodles cooked well, turn off heat
  • Finally, add cilantro and lemon juice. Mix well & serve
  • Happy cooking & enjoy your day ğŸ™‚
Step by step process shown below with pictures: Note:
  • Adjust spices according to taste
  • While cooking rice noodles, If required add more water
  • You can also add dry roasted ground nuts / peanuts (it's optional)
